PersonalInfos.Name: Ankit Kumar
PersonalInfos.Heading: Backend Developer | .NET | Python | SQL | REST APIs

Summary: Backend Engineer with 3+ years of experience building and modernizing large-scale flight booking systems using .NET and Python. Expertise in designing async REST APIs, integrating 60+ airline providers, and migrating legacy WCF platforms to .NET 8. Proficient in SQL Server, MongoDB, internal tooling, and Linux-based deployments. Proven ability to work on high-traffic, business-critical systems.

Responsibilities: Architected and developed a next-gen async flight booking platform using .NET 8, enabling high-concurrency processing.
Led the migration of legacy WCF services (4.7.2) to RESTful APIs, reducing latency and modernizing the tech stack.
Integrated 60+ airline APIs (GDS, LCC, NDC) covering Search, Booking, Rescheduling, and Ticketing flows.
Optimized SQL Server and MongoDB queries and introduced caching, significantly improving API response times.
Designed background scheduler services in C# for automated fraud alerts, data sync, and operational reporting.
Developed 'Flight API Testing System', an internal tool using Python/FastAPI that reduced QA testing cycles by 90%.
Implemented cross-platform hosting support using Kestrel and Linux, replacing IIS-dependent legacy infrastructure.
Collaborated with product and QA teams to troubleshoot production issues and deliver stable, scalable features.
Implemented config-driven architecture for monolithic and microservices-based deployments.
Resolved breaking changes during framework migration including async behavior and threading models.

Projects.Description: Migrated legacy flight services to REST APIs. Implemented async patterns and dependency injection for 60+ suppliers.
Core backend for flight search/booking. Handled complex supplier integrations, pricing logic, and high-volume transactions.
Built tools including an API Testing System and Scheduler Services to automate manual operations.
Internal tool for testing flight APIs across multiple workflows. Migrated from Flask to FastAPI for async support.
Automated services for booking updates, currency sync, and fraud alerts. Saved hours of daily manual effort.
Designed a modern async backend with support for cross-platform deployments on Linux/Windows.

PersonalProjects.Description: Dev utility belt with 20+ privacy-focused tools (JSON/XML formatters). 100% client-side processing.
Android digital clock app for study/desk use. Supports always-on display and custom themes.
Interactive app to help kids learn multiplication tables with audio teaching and gamified tests.
Mental math practice app for speed/accuracy with adaptive difficulty and timed challenges.
